name: Hexa-Hare
description:
Double hop to the next platform and beat your high score! The catch? The terrain depends on the roll of a die...

Land on the next gray platform to increase your score. When you do so, the next set of platforms spawn depending on the roll of the dice above! Missing a jump ends the game, so make sure to take advantage of that double jump!

Controls:

[a]/[d] or [<-]/[->] : move left/right

[space] : jump (press again to double jump)

---

Art

Jumper Pack by Kenney

Music

Wholesome and Teddy Bear Waltz by Kevin MacLeod

SFX

8-Bit Jump Sound Effects by creatorassets
